Northlanders struggling with high living costs can feed their pets thanks to new charity https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlanders-struggling-with-high-living-costs-can-feed-their-pets-thanks-to-new-charity/BAQJJ3PWYNGWTOSN2TZPDIE53M/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/northlanders-struggling-with-high-living-costs-can-feed-their-pets-thanks-to-new-charity/BAQJJ3PWYNGWTOSN2TZPDIE53M/ Jenny LingA new charity is working with food banks to provide pet food for Northland pet owners. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 18:00:27 +0000 Nikki Marchant-Ludlow formed the charity Paws of Hope so families can pick up cartons of pet food at their local food bank when times get tough.

Auckland bank employee Aayush Arora’s gambling addiction sparked $262,000 embezzlement from ANZ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bank-employee-aayush-aroras-gambling-addiction-sparked-262000-embezzlement-from-anz/IZT6JOFXTFAFBCWTTJ36E6YNOA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/auckland-bank-employee-aayush-aroras-gambling-addiction-sparked-262000-embezzlement-from-anz/IZT6JOFXTFAFBCWTTJ36E6YNOA/ Craig KapitanA good chunk of the money was squandered at SkyCity Casino. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:32:37 +0000 Aayush Arora appears for sentencing in Auckland District Court after embezzling $262,000 over the course of a month from his employer, ANZ bank. Photo / Jason Oxenham
Auckland prison death: Family’s fight for answers as body camera footage emerges of pepper spray incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-prison-death-familys-fight-for-answers-as-body-camera-footage-emerges-of-pepper-spray-incident/K22FOINM2ZA6HNHHRPLSNHVCAQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/auckland-prison-death-familys-fight-for-answers-as-body-camera-footage-emerges-of-pepper-spray-incident/K22FOINM2ZA6HNHHRPLSNHVCAQ/ George BlockCaleb died 20 minutes after he was pepper sprayed, but no one has been found responsible. Mon, 19 Feb 2024 16:32:04 +0000 Caleb Moefaauo, who died in custody in Mt Eden Prison in Auckland on April 5, 2022. His family are speaking out for the first time after the release of CCTV footage showing the moment he was pepper sprayed 20 minutes before his death, a fact not put to the jury who acquitted a guard of assaulting Caleb. Photos / Supplied by Moefaauo family.
